Steps.Message: Update at 11:38 - Our engineers have arrived on site to assess the issue with our temporary generator in the Eastgate Terrace area. Using an average timescale for this type of issue, we're looking to have the power back on between 14:00 and 15:00. Please follow the government pandemic guidelines about social distancing when interacting with our staff.

We became aware of a power cut at 11:05. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 11:38 - Our engineers have arrived on site to assess the issue with our temporary generator in the Eastgate Terrace area. Using an average timescale for this type of issue, we're looking to have the power back on between 14:00 and 15:00. Please follow the government pandemic guidelines about social distancing when interacting with our staff.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
